citations.narrative:
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process at 10:30 a.m.
on 03/25/2014.

narrative:
2.38(b)
MISCELLANEOUS.
Section 2.38(b) - Access and inspection of records and property:  Each research facility shall, during business
hours, allow APHIS officials: (1) To enter its place of business.
A facility representative was not available to accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process at 10:30 a.m.
on 03/25/2014.
